divs: Sighting DetailsIt is about 630 AM and as I was writing the following the hairs on my arms and face stand upand at times tears come down my eyes. I tried to do my best describing just acouple of my experiences for you but at times, for my emotions I am short ofwords to describe my exdperiences. So if youre interested you may call me andIll tell you more.Please forgive any punctuations, misspellings or Grammatical errors, as its verylate for me.One night at the South Western Academy dorm in San Marino, I was in bed gettingready to sleep. I heard a very loud low and pulsating humming for a few secondsshaking the buildings window glasses, then I saw pulsating different colorlights falshing, lighting up the out side area. Then I saw the thick main powerline was burnt with a bright white light and fuzzing, so
trends: There have been no other sightings in San Marino
This sighting has never been favorited.
